column4: anyone know how to install a theme for gnome? one comment said to put the folder in ~/.themes/ but that doesn't seem to have worked
drag the tar into the theme list
it will install itself
it just says the file format is invalid
http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/32162210/ <-- this is the theme
are you extracting the file before you drag stuff in there?
I tried both methods
the theme zip contains a folder that looks like the gnome theme and another folder that looks like a winamp theme
DON'T unzip the theme you download.
just drag the archive you downloaded into the list
22:52 < qid> it just says the file format is invalid
what site
22:52 < qid> http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/32162210/ <-- this is the theme
unzip the file, and re-archive it with .tar.gz
thats a .zip extension... don't think that will work... just rezip it
no i just tried it... didn't work. but there is another zip in there, you might have to re archive that as well
if not... i would just goto gnome-look.org to get your themes... or install compiz ;p
actually, it worked for me, it showed up under the Theme Details button
thanks
good
np
but i highly suggest using gnome-look.org instead. you know they will work... although there are some awsome stuff on deviant-art
wow deviantart changed there site layout and stuff... very nice.. much better
